arts.ttl: Birmingham City squad list revealed as three players replaced for League One run-in
arts.sum: Grant Hanley, Lee Myung-jae and Kieran Dowell were added to Blues’ squad in the winter window and they have been named in a 21-man strong list submitted to the EFL. Birmingham City squad list revealed as three players replaced for League One run-in

arts.ttl: Chris Davies lists Kieran Dowell skills after Rangers loanee's perfect start at Birmingham City
arts.sum: Chris Davies toasted Kieran Dowell after the Rangers loanee continued his perfect start to life in a Birmingham City shirt with a starring role in the victory over Cambridge United. Chris Davies lists Kieran Dowell skills after Rangers loanee's perfect start at Birmingham City

arts.ttl: Gary Lineker agrees with Krystian Bielik amid Birmingham City prediction
arts.sum: Gary Lineker has tipped Birmingham City not only to prove they are too good for League One but to thrive if, or when, they are promoted next season. Gary Lineker agrees with Krystian Bielik amid Birmingham City prediction

arts.ttl: Birmingham march on with 4-0 rout of Cambridge
arts.sum: Jay Stansfield’s penalty and Liam Bennett’s own goal were added to by Kieran Dowell and Luke Harris.

arts.ttl: Nobel Peace Prize winner Malala reveals why she supports Birmingham City
arts.sum: She explained how she came to be a fan: “In my first year of high school, a teacher brought me a gift: a Birmingham City Football Club jersey. I reached out my hand for the jersey and my teacher said: ‘The Birmingham team is called the Blues and the fans are called Bluenoses.

arts.ttl: Davies might have to reverse Bielik decision to solve Birmingham City issue
arts.sum: Bielik didn’t fare so well in midfield when Tony Mowbray started to change Blues’ way of playing this time last year. Kieran Dowell, Willum Willumsson, Luke Harris and Blues skipper Krystian Bielik can all do the job, but they aren't natural partners for Iwata in the way injured trio Leonard, Paik and Gardner-Hickman are.

arts.ttl: Birmingham City’s Dion Sanderson in limbo amid John Eustace development
arts.sum: Former Birmingham City boss John Eustace is poised to leave Blackburn Rovers to become the new manager of Championship rivals Derby County. Dion Sanderson reunited with ex-Birmingham City chief John Eustace at Blackburn Rovers in January
